short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Edit Google Docs text styles with your face!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Uses your webcam to set text styles in Google Docs according to your facial expressions; so you can take meeting memos without worrying about the formatting.

Try:
üòê "Normal": Normal black text
ü§î "Question": Orange italic text, when there's something undecided.
üò≤ "Emphasis": Red bold text, when there's something that everyone needs to note.

Coming soon:
- More expressions
- Ability to change face:style association

=========
This extension depends on the (super awesome) clmtrackr project by Audun Mathias √òygard (https://github.com/auduno/clmtrackr/blob/dev/LICENSE.txt), distributed under the MIT License.
